title: All Feeld Majestic Features Explained (2026)
description: A complete guide to every Feeld Majestic feature—what it does, how to use it, and whether it's valuable for you.

body.raw:
Feeld Majestic packs in multiple premium features—but what does each one actually do? This guide explains every Majestic feature so you can understand exactly what you're getting.

---

## See Who Likes You

### What It Does

This feature shows you everyone who has liked your profile before you match with them. Instead of swiping and hoping for matches, you see who's already interested.

### How to Use It

- Access your "Likes Received" section
- Browse through profiles that liked you
- Choose to like them back (instant match) or pass
- Prioritize people already interested

### Why It Matters

**This is Majestic's most valuable feature because:**
- Eliminates guessing about mutual interest
- Guarantees matches when you like back
- Saves time swiping randomly
- Shows your demand immediately

### Best Practices

- Check regularly for new likes
- Don't just auto-match everyone—still be selective
- Use it to understand what profiles attract you
- Quality still matters over quantity

---

## Unlimited Likes

### What It Does

Removes the daily limit on how many profiles you can like. Swipe right as many times as you want without hitting a wall.

### How to Use It

Simply... keep swiping. No more "out of likes" messages or waiting until tomorrow.

### Why It Matters

**Valuable for:**
- Heavy users who hit limits
- People in large dating pools
- Those swiping through many profiles
- Active, daily users

### Best Practices

- Just because you can like unlimited doesn't mean you should
- Stay selective even without limits
- Quality over quantity still applies
- Don't let unlimited = mindless

---

## Advanced Filters

### What It Does

Adds filtering options beyond basic age/distance/gender. Filter by specific desires, what people are looking for, and more precise criteria.

### Available Filters

**Majestic filters may include:**
- Filter by desires/interests
- More precise distance control
- Filter by relationship types sought
- Specific preference filtering

### Why It Matters

**Helps by:**
- Narrowing to compatible people
- Reducing time on mismatches
- Finding specific interests
- More targeted discovery

### Best Practices

- Don't over-filter to the point of no results
- Start broader, then narrow
- Balance specificity with opportunity
- Test different filter combinations

---

## Change Your Location

### What It Does

Lets you set your location to anywhere in the world, showing you profiles in that area as if you were there.

### How to Use It

- Access location settings
- Set a different city/location
- Browse and match in that area
- Switch back when desired

### Why It Matters

**Useful for:**
- Planning travel and pre-connecting
- People in small dating markets
- Exploring other cities' scenes
- Long-distance connections

### Best Practices

- Be honest in conversations about your actual location
- Use for genuine connection, not just browsing
- Consider time zones for messaging
- Let people know if you're actually visiting

---

## Incognito Mode

### What It Does

Lets you browse profiles without appearing to them. Your profile is hidden unless you like someone, which then reveals you to them.

### How to Use It

- Enable incognito in settings
- Browse without being seen
- Only appear to people you like
- Control your visibility completely

### Why It Matters

**Valuable for:**
- Privacy-conscious users
- People who want to browse discretely
- Avoiding being seen by certain people
- Controlling who can find you

### Best Practices

- Remember you'll get fewer incoming likes (they can't see you)
- Use when privacy matters more than visibility
- Toggle on/off based on needs
- Understand the trade-off

---

## Read Receipts

### What It Does

Shows you when your messages have been read by the recipient. You'll see an indicator when they've opened your message.

### How to Use It

- Send messages normally
- Look for read indicator after sending
- Know when messages have been seen
- Understand response context better

### Why It Matters

**Provides:**
- Clarity about whether messages were received
- Information about engagement
- Context for non-responses
- Reduced wondering

### Best Practices

- Don't obsess over read receipts
- A read message without response might just mean they're busy
- Don't create anxiety with this feature
- Use information productively

---

## Past Connections

### What It Does

Lets you see profiles you've previously matched with or interacted with. Access your history of connections.

### How to Use It

- Access your past connections section
- Browse previous matches
- Reconnect if desired
- Review your history

### Why It Matters

**Useful for:**
- Finding people you accidentally unmatched
- Reconnecting after time has passed
- Reviewing your dating history
- Second chances

### Best Practices

- Don't spam old connections
- If reconnecting, be thoughtful
- Learn from past patterns
- Some connections ended for reasons

---

## Profile Boosts

### What It Does

Temporarily increases your profile's visibility, showing it to more people for a period of time.

### How to Use It

- Activate boost feature
- Your profile gets priority placement
- More people see you during boost period
- Potentially more matches during window

### Why It Matters

**Good for:**
- Maximizing visibility at key times
- When you've updated your profile
- Breaking through crowded markets
- Occasional visibility jumps

### Best Practices

- Use after profile updates for maximum impact
- Don't rely on boosts instead of profile quality
- Time strategically (evenings, weekends often better)
- Limited resource—use thoughtfully

---

## Priority Support

### What It Does

Gives you faster access to Feeld customer support for issues, questions, or problems with the app.

### How to Use It

- Contact support through Majestic channels
- Get prioritized response
- Faster resolution of issues
- Better support experience

### Why It Matters

**Valuable when:**
- You have account issues
- Something's not working
- Need help with features
- Encounter problems

---

## Making the Most of Majestic

### Use All Features

**If you're paying:**
- Try every feature at least once
- Understand what each does
- Use what helps, skip what doesn't
- Maximize your investment

### Don't Let Features Replace Fundamentals

**Remember:**
- Great profile still matters most
- Good conversation converts matches
- Features help, don't substitute
- Your success still depends on you

---

## FAQ

**Which feature is most valuable?**
For most users: See Who Likes You. It's the biggest time-saver and changes how you use the app.

**Do I need to use every feature?**
No. Use what's valuable to you. Some features matter more depending on your situation.

**Can I turn features on and off?**
Some features like incognito can be toggled. Others are just available for use when needed.

**Will more features be added?**
Feeld regularly updates—features may change or expand over time.

---

## Related Guides

- [Is Feeld Majestic Worth It? (2026 Review)](/feeld-guide/feeld-majestic-review)
- [Feeld Free vs Paid: What You Actually Get](/feeld-guide/feeld-free-vs-paid)
- [When to Upgrade to Feeld Majestic](/feeld-guide/feeld-when-to-upgrade)

---

## Features Support Connection

Majestic features help you find matches—but conversation creates connection. [Poise](/download) helps you make the most of every match you make.
